mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_house ( fileseq, filename, filerealname, filesize, folderIdx, userIdx, ins_dt ) VALUES ( (SELECT ifnull(MAX(fileseq) + 1, 1) FROM file_house A), #{fileName}, #{fileRealName}, #{fileSize}, 1, 1, sysdate() )
INSERT INTO file_folder ( folderSeq, folderName, userIdx, ins_dt ) VALUES ( (SELECT ifnull(MAX(folderSeq) + 1, 1) FROM file_folder A), #{folderName}, 1, sysdate() )
